column3: 2015 memory wall service info photos / videos alvin e. pete adkins
column6: formerly of collinsville passed away on friday
column8: 2015 at blue ridge nursing home in stuart. pete was born in bassett on january 9
column9: 1929 to the late james adam adkins and the late lessie mae hollandsworth adkins. in addition to his parents he is also preceded in death by his wife pearlie cassady adkins; brothers
column10: shelburn adkins and simmons adkins; sister
column11: frances hundley. pete served his country in the army and was a supervisor at du. pont for 33 years. pete is survived by son
column15: melise a. murphy and her husband
column17: laura roberson and john simpson; great grandchildren
column20: lily barrett and jack simpson and sister
column22: nc. the family will receive friends on monday
column24: 2015 from 2:00 to 3:00 pm at bassett funeral service chapel where a funeral service will be conducted at 3:00 pm with pastor blake edwards officiating. burial will be private at roselawn burial park.
